nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.load

Class AbstractXMLTransformer<OUTPUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.load.AbstractTransformer<XMLRecordInfo,OUTPUT>
      • nl.naturalis.nda.elasticsearch.load.AbstractXMLTransformer<OUTPUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    OUTPUT - The type of object that is output from the transformer
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transformer<XMLRecordInfo,OUTPUT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrsMultiMediaTransformer, CrsSpecimenTransformer, NsrMultiMediaTransformer, NsrTaxonTransformer

    public abstract class AbstractXMLTransformer<OUTPUT>
extends AbstractTransformer<XMLRecordInfo,OUTPUT>
    Base class for transformers that take XML elements as their input. Used for CRS and NSR.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman
